Product Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform that utilizes advanced machine learning algorithms to provide customized training and education to workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.

This platform will help companies and organizations to educate their employees on the best practices for preventing workplace accidents and injuries, reducing downtime, and increasing overall productivity. The AI-powered system will analyze each user's learning style and behavior to provide personalized content, quizzes, and assessments, ensuring that workers receive the most effective training possible. Additionally, the platform will offer real-time analytics and reporting, allowing managers to track progress and identify areas for improvement.

With PREVENT-IA, companies can ensure that their workers are well-equipped to handle the challenges of their jobs, creating a safer and more productive workplace for everyone.
